meanings.definition: A Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice combined with various ingredients such as raw fish, vegetables, and seaweed.
meanings.sent1: I tried making sushis at home with rice and fish.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious sushis with fresh fish.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to make their own sushis!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in making sushis was like an artist painting on rice.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sushis looked like tiny edible artworks.

meanings.sent1: We ordered different types of sushis for the party.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed various sushis to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The sushis on the plate seemed to be having a tiny party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The sushis lined up neatly, resembling soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sushis filled the room, tempting everyone to grab a piece.
